channel.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!
channel.description: [center]Does anyone have an idea how to add a duel arena on a 317 because I'm the Owner of RuneDestiny and users have requested for us to add a duel arena and i have no clue how please contact me on MSN: support@runedestiny.com (IM ONLINE NOW) or comment below with also you're PayPal so i can donate 100.00USD if you help Thanks So Much, -Nick[/center]

item.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

sigh We don’t pay people to help us.

Read full topic

item.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

If you want someone to add the duel arena for you, your pretty much gonna have to give them your source. So unless you want your source leeked out onto these forums you should simpily learn it step by step on your own.

Read full topic

item.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

ProgramingForever:

I tried didint work i allways got the 100 error shit…

the “100 error shit” probably means you missed a bracket or something… if you want to start it off, you’ll probably think about adding a new choice when rightclicking someebody, so it says “duel”, then adding in w/e you want…

Read full topic

item.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!

item.title: Emergency Question!, I WILL PAY 100.00!
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“ProgramingForever, post:3, topic:329453”][quote author=Mental Piracy link=topic=425842.msg3127943#msg3127943 date=1266180808]
This is a very vague question(also one that makes you look like a dumbass who cant program). You have shown no attempt that you have even tried it yourself. If you just want direction on where to start, obviously you should start with the initiation of the dueling(Clicking “challenge”/making challenge show/teleporting to arena). But i am sure you are just asking for someone to spoonfeed you. This is the help section, not a request section.
[/quote]
I tried didint work i allways got the 100 error shit…[/quote]
Cause you are a fucking idiot. I just showed you where to start, ofc you will get errors if its not complete.
Inb4 someone gives him code and he charges back the 100 dollars

Read full topic
